==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{zh|s=尘|t=塵|rm=Chén|tl=Dust}} refers to all external phenomena. In Buddhist theory, {{zh|s=尘|t=塵|rm=chén}} will harm human nature and should be eliminated.
